reviewText: Well the video looks like it would be a fun watch...but after paying $30 for it and getting only a picture with no sound...trying to guess what he is saying gets old fast. If you buy this video and get lucky enough to also get the sound with it....well enjoy!  I bet it will be much more enjoyable for you.  I am disappointed.
Good video to watch with some good details on the title subject, would recommend this video, priced right for the material in this DVD.
